page.title: 14Young fashions of today.
page.content: Permed hair is one of the most fashionable styles of today. The boys' hairstyle is permed all over or just at the back. The girls' hairstyles are wavy, permed all over or just on the top. Girls' fashion in clothes is a tight skirt with a split up the back and a baggy top with a T-shirt underneath, with a thick belt. The boys' fashion is tight jeans with a kappa coat which is waterproof. Trainers are the fashion in shoes for boys with a pod man (a piece of leather with a picture on it) which is attached to the shoe. The girls' fashion in shoes is pod shoes and also high-heeled shoes. The girls' fashion in earrings is round, big and dangly earrings, while boys wear one or more gold studs in one ear.
